original_definition: 'external TSO schedule' means a schedule representing the exchange of electricity between TSOs in different scheduling areas;
generated_definition: 'external TSO schedule' means a schedule agreed upon by two or more tsos for the exchange of electricity outside of their respective scheduling areas, taking into account the generation, consumption, and external commercial trade schedules.

Article 3: ‘external TSO schedule’ means a schedule representing the exchange of electricity between TSOs in different scheduling areas;

‘aggregated netted external schedule’ means a schedule representing the netted aggregation of allexternal TSO schedules andexternal commercial trade schedules between twoscheduling areas or between a scheduling area and a group of other scheduling areas;

‘aggregated netted external schedule’ means a schedule representing the netted aggregation of all external TSO schedules and external commercial trade schedules between two scheduling areas or between a scheduling area and a group of other scheduling areas;
‘external TSO schedule’ means a schedule representing the exchange of electricity between TSOs in differentscheduling areas;
Article 112: 1.   Each TSO operating ascheduling areashall check whether the generation, consumption,external commercial trade schedules andexternal TSO schedules in its scheduling area are in sum balanced.
2.   For external TSO schedules, each TSO shall agree on the values of the schedule with the respective TSO. In the absence of an agreement, the lower value shall apply.
1.   Each TSO operating a scheduling area shall check whether the generation, consumption, external commercial trade schedules and external TSO schedules in its scheduling area are in sum balanced.
2.   Forexternal TSO schedules, each TSO shall agree on the values of the schedule with the respective TSO. In the absence of an agreement, the lower value shall apply.
